#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<list>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#define x getchar_unlocked()
#define y putchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
inline void inp( int &n ) {//fast input function
n=0;
int ch=x,sign=1;
while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=x;}
while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+ ch-'0', ch=x;
n=n*sign;
}


int main() {
	// your code goes here
	    long int num;
	    cin>>num;
	    int i,a[100001],h[10002]={0},max=0,k;
	    for(i=0;i<num;i++)
	        {
	            inp(a[i]);
	            h[a[i]]++;
	        }
	   sort(a,a+num);
	    for(i=0;i<=a[num-1];i++)
	        {   
	            if(max<h[i])
	                {
	                    max=h[i];
	                    k=i;
	                }
	        }
	   cout<<k<<endl;
	   cout<<max<<endl;
	    
	
	return 0;
}
